text: The 1950–51 FAW Welsh Cup is the 64th season of the annual knockout tournament for competitive football teams in Wales. ==Key== League name pointed after clubs name. *CCL - Cheshire County League *FL D2 - Football League Second Division *FL D3N - Football League Third Division North *FL D3S - Football League Third Division South *SFL - Southern Football League ==Fifth round== Eight winners from the Fourth round and six new clubs. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !width=50|Tie no !width=250|Home !width=50|Score !width=250|Away |- |1||Chester (FL D3N)||2–1||Rhyl (CCL) |} ==Sixth round== Seven winners from the Fifth round plus one new club. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !width=50|Tie no !width=250|Home !width=50|Score !width=250|Away |- |1||Merthyr Tydfil (SFL)||5–2||Chester (FL D3N) |} ==Semifinal== Cardiff City and Wrexham played at Shrewsbury, both matches between Newport County and Merthyr Tydfil were held at Cardiff. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !width=50|Tie no !width=250|Home !width=50|Score !width=250|Away |- |1||Cardiff City (FL D2)||1–0||Wrexham (FL D3N) |- |2||Newport County (FL D3S)||1–1||Merthyr Tydfil (SFL) |- |replay||Newport County (FL D3S)||1–4 ||Merthyr Tydfil (SFL) |} ==Final== Final and replay were held at Swansea. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !width=50|Tie no !width=250|Home !width=50|Score !width=250|Away |- |1||Merthyr Tydfil (SFL)||1–1||Cardiff City (FL D2) |- |replay||Merthyr Tydfil (SFL)||3–2 ||Cardiff City (FL D2) |} ==External links== *The FAW Welsh Cup 1950-51 Wales Cup
title: 1950–51 Welsh Cup
